resources.string: This is the image you should wear
For the next few hours, it feels like pants weather.
For the next few hours, it feels like shorts weather.
Pants or Shorts will remember that.
In order to provide temperature measurements, the app needs location permissions!

Location is important for this app. Please grant the location permission. We don\'t keep track of any data, and it is all local to your device. In fact, we don\'t even ask for an exact location, this permission simply gives us an approximate vicinity to use to find the weather in your area.
Location permission denied. We can\'t get the temperature of your location without your locationâ€¦
Icon of snow or sun depending on hot or cold
